attributes.action: Reduce university students tuition fees whilst in lockdown and tier restrictions
attributes.additional_details: Students are often some of the poorest people and yet they are still being charged full tuition fees whilst only receiving a small part of the being taught at university! Why should students be missing out on lectures due to internet issues and having to pay for their own WiFi and half their lecture times halved yet still being paid the full amount??
attributes.background: Make universities reduce students tuition fees by up 50% whilst we’re in lockdown and covid tiers and face to face lectures are not safe.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
